description:
Garth is a professional fighter. I knew immediately from his accent that he was from the east coast.
He's kind of a small guy at 5'5", but he's packing a big piece of meat between his legs. It's almost 8 inches long and really thick!
I wasn't sure how much fun Garth was going to be when I first met him. He's a fighter, straight, and very reserved, so I wasn't sure if he was going to break out of his shell. But, boy did he...
title: Garth
